page.title: 06FARMING
page.content: {A TYPICAL FARMERS DAY: WINTER SUMMER {06.30}Milking {06.30}Milking {08.00}Tanker collects {08.00}Tanker {milk }collects milk BREAKFAST BREAKFAST {09.30}clean cow {09.30}cows led kennels feed cows out to grass and calves and calves fed {11.45 }Spread slurry {09.45-12.30 LUNCH Hay cutting {1.00-3.00}Approx LUNCH maintainance on {1.30-4.30 machinery,fences etc. Hay making {3.30}feed Bullocks {4.30-6.30 and calves milking {4.30}Milking TEA {6.00-6.30}Finish {6.30-10.30 for the day Hay making
